idea-plugin.name: Pipe Table Formatter
idea-plugin.description:
Pipe Table Formatter

Small plugin to format text tables delimited by pipe (|) or comma. For example, can be used to format JBehave examples table.

Usage

Select text in the editor or place caret inside a table and choose action "Format Pipe Table" in Code menu.
idea-plugin.change-notes:

  • Don't mix delimiters when detecting and parsing table, i.e. if table delimiter is pipe then comma is not treated as a delimiter.

Version 0.2.1

  • Autoselect table around caret position

Version 0.2

  • Support for comma delimited tables (converting to pipe delimited)
  • Support for quoted values

Version 0.1

  • Formatting pipe delimited table to human readable representation
